NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
44 
 
 
 
Figure 4-4 Example of a completed antenatal card of a woman with certain (correct) dates 
 
 
At booking (25 February 2014) she was 22 weeks pregnant by dates. The SF measurement of 20cm is in keeping 
with her dates. SF growth was normal, just above the 10th centile. 

NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL
